mapper.insert: insert into f_day_sum ( fcoinid, ftotle, frozen, fcreatetime ) values ( #{fcoinid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ftotle,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{frozen,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
